meetings.topic: Self Publishing Help. Self-Published Contemporary Author, Lita Lawson discusses how to hire an editor and format your work, along with other handy tips regarding publishing your own work. And Self-Published Historical Author, Kat Sheridan will discuss how to write a back cover blurb for your book.
